itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 10-11 : Dr. J.B. Haws : Part I
title: Doctrine & Covenants 10-11 : Dr. J.B. Haws : Part I
description:
A year after the loss of the 116 pages and Doctrine and Covenants, Section 10 shows us that God's wisdom is greater than the Adversary's cunning. Join Dr. J.B. Haws, Hank Smith, and John Bythway as they discuss how our poor choices are turned to victory through the Savior and how the phrase, "Everything happens for a reason," is bad theology. We also learn how to pray so that we spiritually "come off conqueror."
Show notes available at followhim.co
content:encoded:
